title: Top Places to visit in Rajam, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Rajam is a town in Srikakulam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Nagar panchayat and the headquarters of Rajam Mandal.

 

Geography

Rajam is located at 18.28N 83.40E. It has an average elevation of 42 meters (137 feet).

 

Demographics

As of the 2011 India census, Rajam had a population of 62,197.

 

Government and politics

Rajam Nagar panchayat constituted in the year 2005. It is spread over an area of 27.65 km2 (10.68 sq mi) and has 20 election wards. Each represented by a ward member and the wards committee is headed by a chairperson. The present municipal commissioner of the town is P.Simhachalam.

 

Notable people

Grandhi Mallikarjuna Rao – founding chairman of GMR Group

Pingali Nagendrarao - popular Telugu writer, movie scriptwriter, lyricist

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rajam,_Andhra_Pradesh

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Tanuku, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Tanuku is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Tanuku Mandal in the Kovvur revenue division. Tanuku is the Fifth largest town in the West Godavari district after Eluru, Bhimavaram, Tadepalligudem, and Palakollu.
 </p

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Repalle, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Repalle is a town in the Guntur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The town is one of the 12 municipalities in Guntur district and the headquarters of Repalle Mandal under the administration of the Tenali revenue division. Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
